com.jgoodies.forms.tutorial.building
Class PanelBuilderExample

java.lang.Object
  com.jgoodies.forms.tutorial.building.PanelBuilderExample

public final class PanelBuilderExample
extends java.lang.Object

Demonstrates a typical use of the FormLayout. Columns and rows are specified before the panel is filled with components, and the panel is filled with a PanelBuilder.

Unlike the PlainExample, this implementation can delegate the component creation for text labels and titled separators to the builder.

This panel building style is recommended for panels with a medium number of rows and components. If the panel has more rows, you may consider using a row variable to address the current row.

See Also:
PanelBuilder, RowCounterExample, DynamicRowsExample, DefaultFormBuilderExample
